description: This table stores the history of electronic notifications for the premium billing account.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTIF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the notification was sent about the premium billing account.

columns.name: NOTIF_DEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the destination type to which the notification was sent.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Email


SMS


Push

columns.name: NOTIF_DEST
columns.description: Stores the destination to which the notification was sent.

columns.name: NOTIF_SETTING_ID
columns.description: Stores the type of the generic settings notification that was sent.

columns.name: NOTIF_GROUP_SETTING_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique id of the parent generic settings record which represents the type of notification that was sent.
